Name: Leydi Yamileth
description:
Leydi is single and has no children. She lives with her mother and sister, and she also has relatives living abroad.

Leydi has had a business selling vegetables for seven years, and also works in beekeeping, a trade that she learned with her family. She does beekeeping work from 5:00 a.m. to 6:30 a.m. and from 3:00 p.m. to 6:00 p.m., while from 7:00 a.m. to 11:00 a.m., she sells fruits and vegetables.

She is requesting a loan to obtain more financial resources to buy supplies for one of her businesses. She will invest the money in the purchase of a full suit, a bee smoker, and other supplies for beekeeping. She hopes the investment will allow her to get more production from the hive to increase her sales and profits.

Her dream is to grow her businesses and have economic stability to meet her obligations.
